bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Illness Sign identical with cuan shi 竄視 . Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Bai bing zhu zhi yao 百病主治藥： 阿膠，肺風喘促，涎潮目竄，同紫蘇、烏梅煎服 , “Take a jiao boiled with zi su and wu mei for lung wind with panting and urgent breathing, floods of saliva, and scurrying eyes ”. Mu fu 目膚 , eye skin [2]

Pathological Condition identical with fu yi 膚翳 , dermal shade. Ben cao shi yi 本草拾遺 Substance Entry mi 蜜：主牙齒疳䘌，唇 口瘡，目膚赤障 , “It controls gan –illness and hidden worms affecting the teeth, sores on the lips and mouth, and eye skin with red screen”.
